storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the current store the user is interacting/purchasing from.

unverifiedProductIds.title: unverifiedProductIds
unverifiedProductIds.description: Optional: The String[] list of 18 character alphanumeric product Ids to be checked if they are purchasable for the current store. Provide these values if you are checking specific product Ids

unverifiedProducts.title: unverifiedProducts
unverifiedProducts.description: Optional: The Product2[] list of records to be checked if they are purchasable for the current store. Provide these values if you are checking specific products.
